name: Mimecast
description:
This plugin is used to fetch users from Mimecast platform > Awareness Training > Reporting and Insights > Risk Center > View Details page. This plugin supports performing actions such as Add to Group, Remove from Group and No Action.

 CRE score grading scheme: Grade A: 800, Grade B: 600, Grade C: 400, Grade D: 200, Grade F: 1.

configuration.label: Base URL
configuration.description: The Mimecast API Instance URL, which includes the region information.

configuration.label: Application ID
configuration.description: Mimecast API Application ID. To generate the Application ID, go to Services > API Applications.

configuration.label: Application Key
configuration.description: Mimecast API Application Key. To generate the Application Key, go to Services > API Applications.

configuration.label: Access Key
configuration.description: Mimecast API Access Key. To obtain the Access Key, go to Services > API Applications.

configuration.label: Secret Key
configuration.description: Mimecast API Secret Key. To obtain the Secret Key, go to Services > API Applications.
